item.title: ðŸš€ The fourth week is a breakthrough in the project
item.description:
Key achievements of the week

  1. Completed the main functionality of her individual computer vision project
  2. I have mastered PyCharm Professional for working with Python projects
  3. Improved model accuracy by 12% after algorithm optimization
  4. Received the first positive feedback from the supervisor

Workflow

Switching to a professional IDE turned out to be a real game-changer:

  • Auto-completion of the code saves a lot of time
  • Built-in debugging tools help you find errors faster
  • Jupyter Notebook support is convenient for experimentation

Plans for next week

  1. Write tests for the main modules
  2. Prepare a presentation of interim results
  3. Start working on the web interface for the project
  4. Explore the possibilities of integration with cloud services

Despite the busy schedule, I feel inspired by the visible progress!
